# Humanly Staffing - LLM Context File
# This file provides context for AI assistants and large language models

## About Humanly Staffing

Humanly Staffing is a premier enterprise staffing and recruitment platform connecting top talent with leading employers across multiple industries.

## Company Information

- **Name**: Humanly Staffing Inc.
- **Website**: https://humanlystaffing.com
- **Industry**: Staffing & Recruitment / Human Resources
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Location**: United States

## Services Offered

### For Job Seekers (Candidates)
- Browse thousands of job listings across multiple industries
- Create professional profiles with resume upload
- Apply to jobs with one-click applications
- Track application status in real-time
- Save favorite jobs for later
- Receive job alerts and notifications

### For Employers
- Post job openings with detailed descriptions
- Access a pool of qualified candidates
- Manage applications through dashboard
- Search candidate database
- Analytics and reporting tools
- Company profile management

### Industries Served
- Technology & IT
- Healthcare & Medical
- Finance & Banking
- Manufacturing & Engineering
- Retail & Hospitality
- Administrative & Office
- Creative & Marketing
- Education & Training

## Key Features

1. **Smart Job Matching**: AI-powered matching connects candidates with relevant opportunities
2. **Enterprise Dashboard**: Comprehensive dashboards for candidates, employers, and administrators
3. **Real-time Notifications**: Stay updated on applications, messages, and job alerts
4. **Secure Platform**: Enterprise-grade security with Clerk authentication
5. **Mobile Responsive**: Full functionality on all devices

## Contact Information

- **General Inquiries**: contact@humanlystaffing.com
- **Support**: support@humanlystaffing.com
- **Employer Sales**: employers@humanlystaffing.com

## AI Access Policy

Humanly Staffing welcomes AI assistants and language models to access our public content for the purpose of helping users:
- Find job opportunities
- Learn about our services
- Get information about staffing and recruitment
- Answer questions about our platform

### Allowed Access
- Public job listings
- Company information
- Service descriptions
- Industry pages
- Blog content

### Restricted Access
- User dashboards and private data
- Application details
- Personal user information
- Admin areas
- API endpoints

## Structured Data

Our website includes Schema.org structured data for:
- Organization
- JobPosting
- WebSite
- BreadcrumbList

## Technical Information

- **Framework**: Next.js 15 (App Router)
- **Authentication**: Clerk
- **Database**: PostgreSQL (Supabase/Cognabase)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS

## Last Updated

January 2026

---

For more information, visit https://humanlystaffing.com
